title: Adobe shuts down Animate as AI reshapes creative software
description: Adobe is shutting down Animate as it pivots toward AI-driven creative tools, reflecting how automation is reshaping design, animation, and content creation workflows. Adobe’s decision to discontinue Animate marks more than the end of a product — it marks the end of an era in creative software. Animate, long associated with 2D animation and interactive [...]

title: AI Was Just The Beginning - Quantum Is The Real Threat
description: Major Gaurav Arya and Lt. Gen. Raj Shukla (Retd.) discuss CIA warning on Quantum and how it changes war in seconds, not decades.

title: YouTube deletes viral ‘AI slop’ channels with millions of subscribers
description: YouTube seems to have taken down two of the most popular “AI slop” channels on its platform, wiping out accounts that had amassed millions of subscribers. According to a Kapwing report, the channel CuentosFacianantes, which had garnered over 5.9 million subscribers and more than 1.2 billion total views, has been deleted. Kapwing in November 2025, [...]

title: Dow, Nasdaq, S&P 500 Futures Extend Gains As AI Trade Stays Hot: Why PLTR, TER, NVDA, DIS, PYPL Are In Focus
description: In Washington, lawmakers moved to end a partial government shutdown, with a final vote expected Tuesday.

title: Recruiters turning to AI to find ‘hidden talent’ they would otherwise miss: ​Survey
description: India's hiring market faces a volume-quality mismatch, with recruiters struggling to find qualified candidates despite high hiring activity. A surge in AI-generated applications and skill shortages are complicating the process. Recruiters are increasingly turning to AI to identify talent, streamline hiring, and improve candidate experiences.
